All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
IldaFrame
A frame is essentially a collection of points, and some metadata.
IldaPalette
A Palette is a collection of colours.
IldaPoint
A point of an ilda frame.
IldaReader
This class reads a file and passes the data to frames and points.
IldaRenderer
This class can be used to render ilda files as a subclass of PGraphics.
IldaWriter
Writes IldaFrames to an ilda file.
OptimisationSettings
Bundles all optimisation settings, so they are easily shared across the package and easily transported to other projects.
Optimiser
Optimises a frame or frame segments according to its OptimisationSettings.
PicReader
 
Utilities
